sourcesContent:
import { useRive, useViewModelInstanceBoolean, useViewModelInstanceEnum, useViewModelInstanceNumber, useViewModelInstanceTrigger } from "@rive-app/react-webgl2"; export default function App() { const { rive, RiveComponent } = useRive({ src: "/shufflingboxes.riv", artboard: "TV - 1", stateMachines: "State Machine 1", autoplay: true, autoBind: true, // Auto-binding enabled }); const viewModelInstance = rive?.viewModelInstance; // Bind properties const { value: readyToOpen } = useViewModelInstanceBoolean("readyToOpen", viewModelInstance); const { value: winningBox } = useViewModelInstanceNumber("winningBox", viewModelInstance); const { value: shuffleNumber } = useViewModelInstanceNumber("shuffleNumber", viewModelInstance); const { value: winner } = useViewModelInstanceBoolean("winner", viewModelInstance); const { trigger: shuffleBoxes } = useViewModelInstanceTrigger("shuffleBoxes", viewModelInstance); const { value: currentSetUpEnum } = useViewModelInstanceEnum("GameSetup", viewModelInstance); return (

Game State

{readyToOpen ? "Boxes shuffled - pick your winner!" : "Boxes assigned - time to shuffle!"}

View Model Properties

Property Value
Ready to Open {readyToOpen ? "Yes" : "No"}
Winning Box {winningBox}
Shuffle Number {shuffleNumber}
Winner {winner ? "Yes" : "No"}
Game Set Up Enum {currentSetUpEnum}

Welcome to the box-shuffling challenge! Test your luck and see if you can pick the winning box.

); }
